scenarios.name: ESP High Emission with TR Set Trip
scenarios.failure_description: Excessive stack emission opacity > 50mg/Nm3 despite normal inlet load. Ash discharge rotary valve was found stopped; clinker formation suspected in hopper.
scenarios.operator_observations: Ash discharge rotary valve was found stopped; clinker formation suspected in hopper.
scenarios.expected_root_cause: Hopper blockage due to clinker formation causing ash buildup and TR set trip

scenarios.name: Rotary Kiln Main Drive Motor Trip
scenarios.failure_description: Main Drive Motor tripped during kiln rotation. Motor current spiked to 120% of rated FLA. Kiln shell temperature was uneven; red spot observed near tyre #2.
symptoms: Motor current spiked to 120% of rated FLA
Girth gear noise observed prior to trip
scenarios.operator_observations: Kiln shell temperature was uneven; red spot observed near tyre #2.
scenarios.expected_root_cause: Refractory lining damage causing shell deformation and increased mechanical load
relevant_pdfs: Rotary kiln and Annular cooler lubrication_Hongda_OEM Manual.pdf

scenarios.name: Travelling Grate Hydraulic System Failure
scenarios.failure_description: Grate movement stalled; hydraulic system pressure loss. Found oil leakage near the solenoid valve manifold; tank level low.
scenarios.operator_observations: Found oil leakage near the solenoid valve manifold; tank level low.
scenarios.expected_root_cause: Hydraulic oil leak at solenoid valve manifold causing low pressure and pump cavitation

scenarios.name: ID Fan High Vibration Trip
scenarios.failure_description: High vibration on Drive End (DE) bearing requiring shutdown. Fan impeller was cleaned 2 days ago; suspect balance weights might have dislodged.
scenarios.operator_observations: Fan impeller was cleaned 2 days ago; suspect balance weights might have dislodged.
scenarios.expected_root_cause: Impeller imbalance due to dislodged balance weights after recent cleaning

scenarios.name: Grate Cooler Fan Thermal Overload Trip
scenarios.failure_description: Fan motor tripped on thermal overload after 2 hours of operation. Damper actuator linkage appears broken; fan was starting against full load.
symptoms: Air flow rate lower than expected
scenarios.operator_observations: Damper actuator linkage appears broken; fan was starting against full load.
scenarios.expected_root_cause: Broken damper actuator linkage causing fan to operate against full system resistance
